main event: An observer reported seeing a burning object resembling a low flying aircraft in Condon, Oregon on June 3, 1966.
interesting points: The observer estimated the object was at 2000 feet and traveling about 5 miles away., The sighting lasted approximately 3 to 4 seconds., There were burning pieces falling off the object during the sighting., The observer believed it was a crippled aircraft, but no reports of a downed aircraft were confirmed in the area., The report was generated from a Project Blue Book document and concluded that the sighting was likely an aircraft.
sighted object: a burning object resembling a low flying aircraft
